data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 199,700 people living in Margibi, Liberia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Margibi, Liberia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Margibi against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 23,319 believers in Margibi to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 176,381 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Margibi, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Gola people.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Margibi, Liberia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Margibi, Liberia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Margibi, Liberia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

location.name: Margibi
location.people_groups_list: Krahn, Western, Arab, Lebanese, Gbii, Mende, Dan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Krahn, Western (97,000), Arab, Lebanese (60,000), Gbii (10,000), Mende (41,000), Dan (255,000)
